configFiles.template:
SRCDS_TOKEN="${SRCDS_TOKEN}"              (Game Server Token from https://steamcommunity.com/dev/managegameservers)
CS2_SERVERNAME="${Hostname}"   (Set the visible name for your private server.)
CS2_CHEATS="${CS2_CHEATS}"                (0 - disable cheats, 1 - enable cheats)
CS2_SERVER_HIBERNATE="${CS2_SERVER_HIBERNATE}"      (Put server in a low CPU state when there are no players. 
                             0 - hibernation disabled, 1 - hibernation enabled
                             n.b. hibernation has been observed to trigger server crashes)
CS2_LAN="${CS2_LAN}"                 (0 - LAN mode disabled, 1 - LAN Mode enabled)
CS2_RCONPW="${RconPassword}"       (RCON password)
CS2_PW="${PrivatePassword}"                   (Optional, CS2 server password)
CS2_MAXPLAYERS="${CS2_MAXPLAYERS}"           (Max players)
CS2_ADDITIONAL_ARGS="${CS2_ADDITIONAL_ARGS}"      (Optional additional arguments to pass into cs2)
STEAMAPPVALIDATE="${STEAMAPPVALIDATE}"       If you break the game through your customisations and want steamcmd to validate and redownload

editor.label: Server name
editor.description: Set the visible name for your private server

editor.label: SRCDS token
editor.description: Check https://steamcommunity.com/dev/managegameservers

editor.label: Hibernate
editor.description: Put server in a low CPU state when there are no players

editor.label: Additional args
editor.description: Optional additional arguments to pass into cs2

editor.label: Steam app validate
editor.description: If you break the game through your customizations and want steamcmd to validate and redownload

configFiles.template:
CS2_GAMEALIAS="${CS2_GAMEALIAS}"            (Game type, e.g. casual, competitive, deathmatch.
                             See https://developer.valvesoftware.com/wiki/Counter-Strike_2/Dedicated_Servers)
CS2_GAMETYPE="${CS2_GAMETYPE}"              (Used if CS2_GAMEALIAS not defined. See https://developer.valvesoftware.com/wiki/Counter-Strike_2/Dedicated_Servers)
CS2_GAMEMODE="${CS2_GAMEMODE}"              (Used if CS2_GAMEALIAS not defined. See https://developer.valvesoftware.com/wiki/Counter-Strike_2/Dedicated_Servers)
CS2_MAPGROUP="${CS2_MAPGROUP}"    (Map pool. Ignored if workshop maps are defined.)
CS2_STARTMAP="${CS2_STARTMAP}"   (Start map. Ignored if workshop maps are defined.)

editor.label: Game type
editor.description: Game type, e.g. casual, competitive, deathmatch

editor.label: ame type
editor.description: Used if CS2_GAMEALIAS not defined. See https://developer.valvesoftware.com/wiki/Counter-Strike_2/Dedicated_Servers

editor.label: Game mode
editor.description: Used if CS2_GAMEALIAS not defined. See https://developer.valvesoftware.com/wiki/Counter-Strike_2/Dedicated_Servers

editor.label: Map group
editor.description: Map pool. Ignored if workshop maps are defined.

editor.label: Start map
editor.description: Start map. Ignored if workshop maps are defined.

configFiles.template:
CS2_BOT_DIFFICULTY="${CS2_BOT_DIFFICULTY}"       (0 - easy, 1 - normal, 2 - hard, 3 - expert)
CS2_BOT_QUOTA="${CS2_BOT_QUOTA}"            (Number of bots)
CS2_BOT_QUOTA_MODE="${CS2_BOT_QUOTA_MODE}"       (fill, competitive)

editor.label: Bot quota
editor.description: Number of bots

configFiles.template:
TV_ENABLE="${TV_ENABLE}"                 (0 - disable, 1 - enable)
TV_AUTORECORD="${TV_AUTORECORD}"             (Automatically record all games as CSTV demos: 0=off, 1=on)
TV_PW="${TV_PW}"            (CSTV password for clients)
TV_RELAY_PW="${TV_RELAY_PW}"      (CSTV password for relay proxies)
TV_MAXRATE="${TV_MAXRATE}"                (Max CSTV spectator bandwidth rate allowed, 0 == unlimited)
TV_DELAY="${TV_DELAY}"                  (CSTV broadcast delay in seconds)

editor.label: Auto record
editor.description: Automatically record all games as CSTV demos

editor.label: TV password
editor.description: CSTV password for clients

editor.label: TV relay password
editor.description: CSTV password for relay proxies

editor.label: TV Max rate
editor.description: Max CSTV spectator bandwidth rate allowed, 0 == unlimited

editor.label: TV delay
editor.description: CSTV broadcast delay in seconds

configFiles.template:
CS2_LOG="${CS2_LOG}"                ('on'/'off')
CS2_LOG_MONEY="${CS2_LOG_MONEY}"             (Turns money logging on/off: 0=off, 1=on)
CS2_LOG_DETAIL="${CS2_LOG_DETAIL}"            (Combat damage logging: 0=disabled, 1=enemy, 2=friendly, 3=all)
CS2_LOG_ITEMS="${CS2_LOG_ITEMS}"             (Turns item logging on/off: 0=off, 1=on)
DEBUG=${DEBUG}

editor.label: Log detail
editor.description: Combat damage logging

editor.label: Debug logging
editor.description: Increase the verbosity of log output

editor.label: Log money
editor.description: Turns money logging on/off:

editor.label: Log items
editor.description: Turns item logging on/off

configFiles.template:
CS2_HOST_WORKSHOP_MAP="${CS2_HOST_WORKSHOP_MAP}"         (Steam Workshop Map ID to load on server start)   
CS2_HOST_WORKSHOP_COLLECTION="${CS2_HOST_WORKSHOP_COLLECTION}"  (Steam Workshop Collection ID to download)

editor.label: Workshop map
editor.description: Steam Workshop Map ID to load on server start

editor.label: Workshop collection id
editor.description: Steam Workshop Collection ID to download

configFiles.description: Executed before the CS2 server starts
configFiles.template:
#!/bin/bash

# PRE HOOK
#  Make your customisation here
echo "pre-hook: noop"

if [ ! -x ./rcon.pl ]; then
    echo "Downloading RCON tool..."
    wget https://cdnsource.tcadmin.net/games/SourceRCON.pl -O rcon.pl
    chmod +x rcon.pl
else
    echo "RCON tool already exists — skipping download."
fi

if [ ! -x ./exec.sh ]; then
    echo '#!/bin/bash' > exec.sh
    echo -n '/home/steam/cs2-dedicated/game/rcon.pl 127.0.0.1 ${RConPort} ${RconPassword}' >> exec.sh
    chmod +x exec.sh
else
    echo "exec.sh already exists"
fi

configFiles.description: Executed after the CS2 server stops

rootPermission.defaultPermissions: ReadFile, WriteFile, DeleteFile, RenameFile, ListDirectory, CreateDirectory, DeleteDirectory, RenameDirectory
